channel.title: Peter Wallhead
channel.description: Web developing. Robot building. Real coding.

item.title: Simple Ultrasonic Obstacle Avoidance
item.description: Inspired by an article by John Boxall for Little Bird Electronics I recently bought myself a Parallax Ping))) Ultrasonic Distance Sensor to try out. This great little sensor can measure distances between ~2cm and ~3m in length.

item.title: Homemade Arduino Controlled Servo
item.description: Even though one can easily buy hobby servos online, I thought I'd have a go at making, and programming, one with some spare parts I had laying around to see how they tick.
